mapper.select: /*SELECT addressId as id,province,avgRiskValue,craneNumber,color FROM province_riskvalue_temp WHERE userId=#{userId} ORDER BY craneNumber DESC*/ SELECT a.id,a.province,round(avg(r.riskvalue)) as avgRiskValue,count(DISTINCT(cr.reportnumber)) as craneNumber,col.riskcolor as color FROM craneinspectreport cr,riskvalue r,address a,riskcolor col,user u,drole dr,user_drole udr,drole_address draddr WHERE u.id=#{userId} and cr.reportnumber=r.reportnumber AND col.riskvalue=r.riskvalue AND u.id=udr.userId AND udr.droleId=dr.id AND draddr.droleId=dr.id AND draddr.addressId=a.id AND a.id=cr.addressId GROUP BY a.province order by craneNumber desc
